divs: Sighting DetailsGirl goes on break while working at retail store in Newtown, PA. Takes picture of sky and posts it on facebook, saying scary. Looks more like the famous triangle ufo, than a storm cloud.
Summary: {dr}Teenaged college student captures storm? lights on cell phone
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Newtown
There were no other sightings in Newtown on or around July 18th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
